div.p: This post is the continuation of my previous AngularJS tutorial, I had explained JSON parsing using AngularJS. In this we are going to explain how to do two way data binding with Angular JS. Data binding is the most useful feature in AngularJS, It will help you to save from writing a lots of regular code.
